# Introduction

`r emo::ji("waving_hand")` Hello and welcome! This book will contain notes on a variety of epidemiologic topics including study design and biases.

`r emo::ji("warning")` At present, this is a **not a functional book** and the content is **a work in progress** `r emo::ji("wrench")`.

**The current version of the book has not been reviewed for correctness and references.**
